name.japanese: インペルダウン脱獄軍艦

description: A Marine battleship stolen by Luffy and the escaped Impel Down prisoners. The ship was used to escape Impel Down and travel to Marineford, falling from the sky into the bay.

keyEvents.title: Falls from Sky into Marineford
keyEvents.description: After Ivankov's Hell Wink knocked it forward instead of sliding it down, the battleship flipped upside-down and fell from the sky into one of the few unfrozen spots of ocean at Marineford. The impact split the boat in two.
keyEvents.significance: Delivered Luffy and his allies to the war in a dramatic fashion, shocking all present forces.

statusHistory.reason: Split in two upon impact with the ocean at Marineford
